body_text:
\Gamma and \gamma are two different things! Please revert that change.
…
On Sun, Sep 30, 2018 at 11:22 Wei Yang ***@***.***> wrote:
 ***@***.**** commented on this pull request.
 ------------------------------

 In torch/_torch_docs.py
 <#12126 (comment)>:

 > @@ -1210,7 +1210,7 @@ def parse_kwargs(desc):
  Computes the logarithmic derivative of the gamma function on `input`.

  .. math::
 -    \psi(x) = \frac{d}{dx} \ln\left(\Gamma\left(x\right)\right) = \frac{\Gamma'(x)}{\Gamma(x)}
 +    \psi(x) = \frac{d}{dx} \ln\left(\gamma\left(x\right)\right) = \frac{\gamma'(x)}{\gamma(x)}

 yeah, could be

body:
\Gamma and \gamma are two different things! Please revert that change.

On Sun, Sep 30, 2018 at 11:22 Wei Yang <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> *@weiyangfb* commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In torch/_torch_docs.py
> <https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/12126#discussion_r221468436>:
>
> > @@ -1210,7 +1210,7 @@ def parse_kwargs(desc):
>  Computes the logarithmic derivative of the gamma function on `input`.
>
>  .. math::
> -    \psi(x) = \frac{d}{dx} \ln\left(\Gamma\left(x\right)\right) = \frac{\Gamma'(x)}{\Gamma(x)}
> +    \psi(x) = \frac{d}{dx} \ln\left(\gamma\left(x\right)\right) = \frac{\gamma'(x)}{\gamma(x)}
>
> yeah, could be
>
